testcase.name: testTwoHobgoblins

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: The attack of the minion is different than expected. Index: 2. Expected minion: Minion(Slime) 5/6 ?. Actual minion: Minion(Slime) 1/2 TAUNT

testcase.name: testIllidanPlayToItsRightSide

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: The size of the board is different than expected. Expected board: [Minion(Chillwind Yeti) 4/5 ?, Minion(Illidan Stormrage) 7/5 ?, Minion(Flame of Azzinoth) 2/1 ?, Minion(Slime) 1/2 ?, Minion(Chillwind Yeti) 4/5 ?]. Actual board: [Minion(Chillwind Yeti) 4/5, Minion(Illidan Stormrage) 7/5, Minion(Slime) 1/2 TAUNT, Minion(Chillwind Yeti) 4/5]

Actual board: [Minion(Chillwind Yeti) 4/5, Minion(Slime) 1/2 TAUNT, Minion(Illidan Stormrage) 7/5, Minion(Chillwind Yeti) 4/5]
